message:
Java PathFinder from NASA (not new).
JPF started as a software model checker but it integrates model checking, program analysis and testing.
http://ebeid-soliman.blogspot.com/2013/03/getting-started-with-java-pathfinder.html
name: Midnight Researcher Notes: Getting Started with Java PathFinder
caption: ebeid-soliman.blogspot.com
description: Java™ Pathfinder, or "JPF"as we call it from here, is a highly customizable execution environment for verification of Java™ bytecode programs. JPF was developed at the NASA Ames Research Center, open sourced in 2005, and is freely available here under the NOSA 1.3 license. JPF started as a software…
